00035 RainbruRPG::Editor::EditorMainWindow::EditorMainWindow(const QString &fileName, QWidget *parent)
00036                   : QMainWindow(parent)
00037 {
00038   LOGI("Creating MainWindow");
00039   QFileInfo fileInfo(fileName);
00040 
00041   tabWidget=new QTabWidget(this);
00042   scriptEditor = new ScriptEditor();
00043 
00044   //Ogre View
00045   ogreView = new OgreView(tabWidget);
00046   ogreView->setFocusPolicy(Qt::ClickFocus);
00047   ogreView->setMinimumSize(105, 355);
00049 
00050   //tool tab
00051   toolTab = new QTabWidget();
00052   toolTab->setMinimumSize(243, 350);
00053   //  toolTab->setTabShape(QTabWidget::Triangular);
00054 
00055   objTab=new ObjectsTab();
00056   toolTab->addTab(objTab, QIcon(":/images/object.png"), "Objects" );
00057 
00058   TabEnvironment *tabEnv=new TabEnvironment();
00059   toolTab->addTab(tabEnv, "Environment" );
00061 
00062   //Ogre Log
00063   ogreLog = new QTextEdit;
00064   ogreLog->setReadOnly(true);
00065   ogreLog->setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Ignored, QSizePolicy::Ignored);
00066   ogreLog->setMinimumSize(100, 73);
00067   ogreLog->insertPlainText(ogreView->getLog().c_str());
00068   connect(ogreLog, SIGNAL(textChanged()), this, SLOT(scrollLog()));
00069   
00070   QDockWidget *propDock = new QDockWidget("Tools");
00071   propDock->setWidget(toolTab);
00072   propDock->setAllowedAreas(Qt::LeftDockWidgetArea | Qt::RightDockWidgetArea);
00073   addDockWidget(Qt::LeftDockWidgetArea, propDock);
00074   
00075   QDockWidget *logDock = new QDockWidget("Log");
00076   logDock->setWidget(ogreLog);
00077   logDock->setAllowedAreas(Qt::TopDockWidgetArea | Qt::BottomDockWidgetArea);
00078   addDockWidget(Qt::BottomDockWidgetArea, logDock);
00079   
00080   // Init to white the diffuse and specular colors 
00081   // (NOTE: the initialisation takes effect on the "LightWindow")
00082   diffuseLightColor.setRgba(qRgba(255, 255, 255, 255));
00083   specularLightColor.setRgba(qRgba(255, 255, 255, 255));
00084   // This is our first light created by hand in LightWindow, 
00085   // so we've to put in the "blacklist" of names
00086   listName.push_back("Main Light");
00087   
00088   createActions();
00089   createMenus();
00090   createToolBars();
00091   
00092   QStatusBar(this);
00093   
00094   startTimer(50);
00095   
00096   setWindowTitle(fileName);
00097   setWindowIcon(QIcon(":/images/ogre.png"));
00098   setGeometry(50, 50, 1024, 768);
00099   
00100   tabWidget->addTab(ogreView, QIcon(":/images/3d.png"), "3D view");
00101 
00102   setCentralWidget(tabWidget);
00103   LOGI("MainWindow created");
00104 }

00109 RainbruRPG::Editor::EditorMainWindow::~EditorMainWindow(){
00110   delete objTab;
00111   delete scriptEditor;
00112 
00113   objTab=NULL;
00114 }

00121 void RainbruRPG::Editor::EditorMainWindow::scrollLog(){
00122         ogreLog->verticalScrollBar()
00123           ->setValue( ogreLog->verticalScrollBar()->maximum() );
00124 };

00129 void RainbruRPG::Editor::EditorMainWindow::about(){
00130   QString ogreVersion = QString::number(OGRE_VERSION_MAJOR) + "." 
00131     + QString::number(OGRE_VERSION_MINOR) + "." 
00132     + QString::number(OGRE_VERSION_PATCH);
00133   QMessageBox::about(this, tr("About Show Mesh"),
00134         tr("Show Mesh %1\n").arg("1.1") +
00135         tr("Copyright (C) 2006 Quentin Bereau\n\n") +
00136         tr("Licensed under the GPLv2\n") +
00137         tr("Using Ogre %1 and Qt %2\n\n").arg(ogreVersion).arg(qVersion()) +
00138         tr("Developers:\n") +
00139         tr("Quentin Bereau <scratattack@users.sourceforge.net>\n") +
00140         tr("John Eric Martin <cpuwhiz105@users.sourceforge.net>"));
00141 }

00146 void RainbruRPG::Editor::EditorMainWindow::createActions(){
00147   addObjAct = new QAction(QIcon(":/images/object.png"), tr("&Add Object"), this);
00148   addObjAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+O"));
00149   addObjAct->setStatusTip(tr("Add Object"));
00150   connect(addObjAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(addObj()));
00151   
00152   addLightAct = new QAction(QIcon(":/images/light.png"), tr("Add &Light"), this);
00153   addLightAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+L"));
00154   addLightAct->setStatusTip(tr("Add Light"));
00155   connect(addLightAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(addLight()));
00156   
00157   quitAct = new QAction(tr("&Quit"), this);
00158   quitAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+Q"));
00159   quitAct->setStatusTip(tr("Quit the application"));
00160   connect(quitAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(close()));
00161   
00162   scriptAct = new QAction(tr("&Set Script Path"), this);
00163   scriptAct->setStatusTip(tr("Set Script Path"));
00164   connect(scriptAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(setScriptPath()));
00165   
00166   textureAct = new QAction(tr("&Set Texture Path"), this);
00167   textureAct->setStatusTip(tr("Set Texture Path"));
00168   connect(textureAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(setTexturePath()));
00169   
00170   aboutAct = new QAction(tr("&About"), this);
00171   aboutAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+A"));
00172   aboutAct->setStatusTip(tr("About"));
00173   connect(aboutAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(about()));
00174 
00175 }

00180 void RainbruRPG::Editor::EditorMainWindow::createMenus(){
00181   // The script editor action
00182   QAction* scriptEditorAct = new QAction(tr("&ScriptEditor"), this);
00183   scriptEditorAct->setShortcut(tr("Ctrl+E"));
00184   scriptEditorAct->setStatusTip(tr("Open the script editor"));
00185   connect(scriptEditorAct, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, 
00186           SLOT(showScriptEditor()));
00187 
00188   fileMenu = menuBar()->addMenu(tr("&File"));
00189   //fileMenu->addAction(newAct);
00190   fileMenu->addAction(addObjAct);
00191   fileMenu->addAction(addLightAct);
00192   fileMenu->addSeparator();
00193   fileMenu->addAction(quitAct);
00194   
00195   editMenu = menuBar()->addMenu(tr("&Edit"));
00196   editMenu->addAction(scriptEditorAct);
00197 
00198   matMenu = editMenu->addMenu(tr("&Materials Properties"));
00199   matMenu->addAction(scriptAct);
00200   matMenu->addAction(textureAct);
00201   
00202 
00203   helpMenu = menuBar()->addMenu(tr("&Help"));
00204   helpMenu->addAction(aboutAct);
00205 
00206 }

00211 void RainbruRPG::Editor::EditorMainWindow::createToolBars(){
00212   fileToolBar = addToolBar(tr("File"));
00213   fileToolBar->addAction(addObjAct);
00214   fileToolBar->addAction(addLightAct);
00215 }

00222 void RainbruRPG::Editor::EditorMainWindow::timerEvent(QTimerEvent* evt){
00223   Q_UNUSED(evt);
00224   statusBar()->clearMessage();
00225   
00226   QString fullMsg;
00227   fullMsg += "FPS : ";
00228   
00229   QString nbFPS;
00230   nbFPS.setNum(ogreView->getFPS());
00231   fullMsg += nbFPS;
00232   
00233   fullMsg += "     ";
00234   fullMsg += "Triangles : ";
00235   
00236   QString nbTriangles;
00237   nbTriangles.setNum(ogreView->getTriangles());
00238   fullMsg += nbTriangles;
00239   
00240   //POSITION
00241   fullMsg += "     ";
00242   fullMsg += "Position : ";
00243   
00244   QString camX;
00245   camX.setNum(ogreView->getPosCamera().x);
00246   fullMsg += camX;
00247   fullMsg += ", ";
00248   
00249   QString camY;
00250   camY.setNum(ogreView->getPosCamera().y);
00251   fullMsg += camY;
00252   fullMsg += ", ";
00253   
00254   QString camZ;
00255   camZ.setNum(ogreView->getPosCamera().z);
00256   fullMsg += camZ;
00257   
00258   //DIRECTION
00259   fullMsg += "     ";
00260   fullMsg += "Direction : ";
00261   
00262   QString dirX;
00263   dirX.setNum(ogreView->getDirCamera().x);
00264   fullMsg += dirX;
00265   fullMsg += ", ";
00266   
00267   QString dirY;
00268   dirY.setNum(ogreView->getDirCamera().y);
00269   fullMsg += dirY;
00270   fullMsg += ", ";
00271   
00272   QString dirZ;
00273   dirZ.setNum(ogreView->getDirCamera().z);
00274   fullMsg += dirZ;
00275   
00276   statusBar()->showMessage(fullMsg);//Update stats
00277 }

00291 void RainbruRPG::Editor::EditorMainWindow::showScriptEditor(){
00292   int i=tabWidget->addTab(scriptEditor,QIcon(":images/script.png"),
00293                           "unnamed.lua");
00294 
00295   tabWidget->setCurrentIndex(i);
00296 }
